text: Paola Morán Errejón (born 25 February 1997) is a Mexican sprinter specialized in the 400 metres. She won two medals at the 2019 Summer Universiade. She finished 9th at the 2019 World Championships in Doha, Qatar. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=3|2014 |rowspan=2|Central American and Caribbean Junior
